name: Winter Forest Survival 3D
description:
Winter Forest Survival 3D - great game for those who are tired of usual island survival simulators! You will meet wild animals and predators, learn how to hunt, explore taiga woods, quarry resources and craft weapons and tools you need. Explore unusual pixel environment, feed your character with hunted loot, cut trees to get wood and build a house and stay alive! Don’t forget to check survivor’s status – don’t let it become red!
Features:
- Amazing winter survival simulator in 3D
- Trees, buildings, weapons, clothes and even YOU!
- Hunt wild animals to get food, build shelters to hide from freezing cold, craft weapons and tools to make your life easier
- Unique crafting system – quarry resources to craft anything you need
